dialogue.speaker: NPC Villager
dialogue.text: We've been expecting you. Our village is in peril.

dialogue.speaker: Player Character
dialogue.text: What's wrong? What's happening to your village?

dialogue.speaker: NPC Villager
dialogue.text: A dark sorcerer has been terrorizing us. He demands we give him all our treasure.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: The fate of the village hangs in the balance. Will you answer their call for help?
